articles.title: Virat Kohli Hits Nets, Gets Into Groove Ahead Of WTC Final vs Australia. See Pics - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Virat Kohli hit the nets on Friday to get into his groove ahead of the all-important clash against Australia
articles.content: With less than week left for the start of the World Test Championship (WTC) final, star India batter Virat Kohli hit the nets on Friday to get into his groove ahead of the all-important clash against… [+1512 chars]
